plot: An unknown invader known as the "Kiseichū" invades Earth and begins robbing people of the source of their erotic "H energy," robbing them of the will to live. Retto Enjō, a high school boy, joins the hero organization HxEros, and alongside four beautiful high school girls, will save the Earth from the alien threat. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Wake Up Hx ERO! feat. Yoshitsugu Matsuoka Yoshitsugu" by BURNOUT SYNDROMES
